titleStmt.title: Two speeches made by Sr. Thomas Wentworth: now Earle of Strafford, in the Parliament holden at VVestminster. 1628. The one concerning the liberty of the subject. The other the priviledge of the Houses of Parliament.
titleStmt.author: Strafford, Thomas Wentworth, Earl of, 1593-1641.

notesStmt.note: Composed of two speeches. Thomason E.196[43] has caption title: "Sir Thomas VVentworths speech, xxijd. Martij, 1627." on first page of text. Thomason E.196[44] has caption title: "Sir Thomas Wentworths speech, 21. of Aprill, anno, 1628." on page 5.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
